title: Petition: Fizz Ult Change
body: Make it so that if Fizz uses his ult, and it misses, but then catches somebody in the expanded AoE, only becomes a half size shark. Still max size if you actually hit the skillshot portion at max range. Buff him in other places if necessary.

I found the problem to your proposal. 

What exactly would you suggest? Fizz being able to actually kill people without his ult again? A even lower cooldown on his E? Maybe his Q? More base damage? More base health? 

You might not like the shark size, but "buff him in other areas" isnt a solution - people dont want his other abilities buffed either. If you decide to nerf the shark and buff his other abilities, then the boards will explode with "Fizz can assassinate without his ult with a Lich Bane + Ludens +Protobelt combo".

Well that depends on what we want fizz to be. If the entirety of the Fizz champion is "can 1 shot you with ult up", then we've got a problem.

We could upgrade his push potential, make his E apply his W to minions so he can clear a little faster.

We could make his GigaShark (the max range one), **more** menacing, because you'd actually have to land the skillshot.

Lowering his Q cool down wouldn't be the worst, makes him more slippery and buffs damage over the course of a team fight, but not his burst (and is less of a 'get out of jail free' card than his E).

It's entirely possible to put the power in Fizz's kit into more reasonable mechanics. We have options.

How about slightly increase base width and size of ult hitbox, but don't make it expand with range. This way he actually has to aim and land it rather than ult down lane and it just attaches from a mile away.

how about:

Make it so that if Fizz uses his ult, and it misses,  it does NOT expand or latch on. It goes on cooldown.
